SELECT R.RESV_NO, TO_CHAR(R.RESV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || R.RESV_TIME AS RESV_DATETIME, B.BABY_NAME, B.BABY_REGNO1, B.BABY_NO, R.RESV_ROOM FROM RESERVATION R, BABY B WHERE R.BABY_NO = B.BABY_NO
AND TO_CHAR(R.RESV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY R.RESV_NO, R.RESV_TYPE
